data.actual_result: It doesn't scroll up. You have to scroll up a bit before you tap on the status bar in order to scroll up
data.expected_result: It should scroll up when you tap on the status bar
data.short_description: [Blocked] Tapping on the iOS status bar to scroll up doesn't work if you're at the bottom of the chat
data.steps_to_repro: - Go right to the bottom of any text channel - Tap on the status bar
